Definition: Unique identifier for census tract
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: City Name
Source: Proximity One Census Tract - City Place Relationship Table

Definition: County Name
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD) Survey

Definition: state name abbreviation
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD) Survey

Definition: County FIPS code
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD) Survey

Definition: Core based statistical area code (CBSA is micropolitan and metropolitan statistical areas combined)
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD) Survey

Definition: Core based statistical area name
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD) Survey

Definition: State FIPS code
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD) Survey

Definition: Population of census tract
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Equals one if the tract is considered disadvantaged in the J40 index and zero if not
Source: computed

Definition: Percent of households (interpreted as individuals) where no one in the household speaks English well
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: Percent of total population over age 64
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: Percent of housing units built before 1960 (lead paint indicator)
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: EJ Index for Diesel particulate matter level in air
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: EJ Index for Air toxics cancer risk
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: EJ Index for Traffic proximity and volume  (PTRAF)
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: EJ Index for Indicator for major direct dischargers to water
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: EJ Index for Proximity to National Priorities List (NPL) sites  (PNPL)
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: EJ Index for Proximity to Risk Management Plan (RMP) facilities  (PRMP)
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: EJ Index for Proximity to Treatment Storage and Disposal (TSDF) facilities
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: EJ Index for PM2.5 level in air (PM25)
Source: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Environmental Justice Mapping and Screening Tool (EJSCREEN), 2020

Definition: Percent of total population with a drive time to employment greater than or equal to 30 minutes
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Percent of total population with no vehicle(s) available
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Annual average energy burden based on average annual housing energy costs divided by the average annual household income
Source: U.S. DOE Low-income Energy Affordability Data (LEAD) Tool, 2018

Definition: Percent of total civilian jobs in the fossil energy sector
Source: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) Current Employment Statistics (CES), 2018

Definition: Percent of total civilian jobs in the coal sector
Source: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) Current Employment Statistics (CES), 2018

Definition: Number of power outage events that occurred for all census tracts in each county from 2017-2020
Source: U.S. DOE Electric Emergency Incident and Disturbance Report (Form OE-417), from Jan. 2017-Dec. 2020

Definition: Average duration of power outage events (in minutes) that occurred for all census tracts in each county from 2017-2020
Source: U.S. DOE Electric Emergency Incident and Disturbance Report (Form OE-417), from Jan. 2017-Dec. 2020

Definition: Share of neighborhood without access to affordable or good-quality fresh food (Percentage who live within 1/2 mile (urban) or 10 miles (rural) of supermarket
Source: U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA), Food Access Research Atlas Data, 2019

Definition: Job Access Score (0-10)  (negative value enters the index)
Source: Center for Neighborhood Technology (CNT) Housing and Transportation Affordability Index (H+T® Index), 2016

Definition: Housing Costs % Income for the Regional Typical Household
Source: Center for Neighborhood Technology (CNT) Housing and Transportation Affordability Index (H+T® Index), 2016

Definition: Proportion of occupied housing units not occupied by property owners
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Transportation Costs % Income for the Regional Typical Household
Source: Center for Neighborhood Technology (CNT) Housing and Transportation Affordability Index (H+T® Index), 2016

Definition: Percent of Households with No Internet Access
Source: U.S. Department of Commerce National Telecommunications and Information Administration, 2021

Definition: Count of parks per census tract (negative value enters the index)
Source: ESRI USA Parks geodatabase

Definition: Representative of homeless population; calculated using total number of Sheltered and Unsheltered Population per sq. km
Source: U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development, Continuum of Care GIS Tools, 2019

Definition: Percent of population without health insurance coverage
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Percent of civilian labor force reported as unemployed
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Percent of the non-institutionalized population with any disability
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Percent of occupied housing units without complete plumbing
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Proportion of family households with children under age 18 with only one parent
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Percent of total population in mobile homes
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Percent of households that use a fuel other than grid-connected gas or electricity or solar energy as their main heat source
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Percent of total population, age 25 and older, whose reported education is short of a high school diploma
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Percent of total population reported at or below 200% of the Federal Poverty Level
Source: U.S. Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS) 5 year estimates, 2015-2019

Definition: Percent of total population considered low income based on area median income
Source: Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) LMISD - All Block Groups, Based on 2011-2015 ACS

Description: Climate Hazards Loss of Life estimates
Definition: Expected annual loss of life (fatalities and injuries) from 18 different climate hazards
Source: U.S. Department of Homeland Security Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA), National Risk Index (NRI), 2020
